data.text: @TheNickMSm @JerryMassey We clearly do and did understand that. The point stands. Stand by your people in difficult times, no matter the nationality.

@JerryMassey @nomadcapitalist Locally employed staff refers to Ukrainians who worked at the US embassy, not Americans. I would expect someone providing cap. nomadism as a service to understand the basics of diplomatic institutions…

@nomadcapitalist When living the Nomad Capitalist lifestyle, what are your thoughts on banking with HSBC? Apparently they have a "Premier Account" that can be used all over the world, which includes free Global Transfers.

@nomadcapitalist America ain't helping anyone. 
I'll bet if Russia walked into the white house they would just give a strongly discouraging speech about it as they were being arrested. 🥲

@nomadcapitalist Yesterday, Hungary's PM made a video stating that the Hungarian people have the full resources of the embassy at their disposal for Hungarians stuck in Ukraine. Meanwhile, the U.S. posts a “we tried” statement which will probably be the extent of what they do for Americans.
@nomadcapitalist "Henderson-led SpecOps extraction is included in our platinum package!"
